name: custom-web3-provider-sdk
description: Universal Web3 Provider SDK. A robust, production-ready JavaScript/TypeScript SDK that provides comprehensive wallet connection utilities for blockchain applications with enhanced error handling, retry mechanisms, and comprehensive wallet functionality.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.check-all: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.build:pack: npm run clean && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.install:demo: npm run build:pack && cd demo && npm unlink custom-web3-provider-sdk 2>/dev/null || true && npm install ../custom-web3-provider-sdk-1.0.0.tgz && cd .. && rm -f custom-web3-provider-sdk-*.tgz
scripts.rebuild:demo: npm run clean && npm run build && npm pack && cd demo && npm install ../custom-web3-provider-sdk-1.0.0.tgz && cd .. && rm -f custom-web3-provider-sdk-*.tgz

author: Antier PVT LTD
